dict.string: if test \! -e "$TM_NEW_FILE"; then TM_DATE=`date +%Y.%m.%d` \ a=`echo ${TM_NEW_FILE%/*}` \ b=`echo ${a#${TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY%/*}/} | tr '/' '.'` \ c=`echo ${b//[\.a-zA-Z]*main\./}` \ d=`echo ${c//[\.a-zA-Z]*main/}` \ e=`echo ${d//[\.a-zA-Z]*lib\./}` \ f=`echo ${e//[\.a-zA-Z]*lib/}` \ TM_CLASS_PATH=`echo "$f"` \ perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' \ < class.as > "$TM_NEW_FILE"; fi
